name: Project Sisyphus (Alpha)
description:
Project Sisyphus is a first person dungeon crawler inspired by games such as Shin Megami Tensei: Strange Journey and Etrian Odyssey. It's a passion project: our first foray into game development. More levels and enemies will be added as development goes on, this is still an early alpha build. Any and all feedback is much appreciated, we hope you enjoy our game!


Please follow our twitter (@PlaySisyphus) for updates on its development.

Field Controls:

WASD - Movement
E - Interact
TAB/ESC - Menu

Menu Controls:

Mouse - Click on UI elements
(In Battle) - Press key displayed at bottom of screen to do damage
(In Shop) - ESC to close out
